spell_tooltip.description: Removing hostile magic effects from a target increases the healing they receive from you by 10% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Thunder Focus Tea provides immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Revival's cooldown is reduced by 16%, and provides immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 2 sec.

Heals the target for 1.5 million over 9.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.5 million over 9.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 213,896 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 209,111 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Targets you Roll through are snared by 40% for 5 sec.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 21,420 Nature damage or 87,604 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Torpedoes you forward a long distance and increases your movement speed by 30% for 10 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
The duration of snare effects on you is reduced by 20%.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Summons a Jade Serpent Statue at the target location. When you channel Soothing Mist, the statue will also begin to channel Soothing Mist on your target, healing for 798,963 over 9.6 sec.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 369,830 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 298,732 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.5 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 232,954 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.5 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 120,055, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 98,831. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 98,442.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.4 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

Vivify has a 20% chance to cause your next Rising Sun Kick or Enveloping Mist to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Enveloping Mist and Rising Sun Kick have a 20% chance to cause your next Vivify to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 153,046 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summons an effigy of Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent for 25 sec. Yu'lon will heal injured allies with Soothing Breath, healing the target and up to 2 allies for 188,500 over 6.8 sec. 

Enveloping Mist costs 50% less mana while Yu'lon is active.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 121,617 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 2.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

5% of your overhealing done onto targets with Soothing Mist is spread to 3 nearby injured allies.

Soothing Mist now follows the target of your Enveloping Mist or Vivify and its channel time is increased by 4 sec.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.
Gust of Mists has a 30% chance to do 120% more healing.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Allies targeted by Soothing Mist receive 40% more healing from your Enveloping Mist and Renewing Mist effects.
Each time Enveloping Mist heals, its healing bonus has a 50% chance to spread to an injured ally within 30 yds.

Casting Vivify or Enveloping Mist on a target with Renewing Mist has a 10% chance to spread the Renewing Mist to another target.

Your Vivify healing through Renewing Mist is increased by 10% and your Enveloping Mist also heals allies with Renewing Mist for 12% of its healing.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing. Vitality stored from overhealing is reduced.

For 10 sec after casting Thunder Focus Tea your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional healing over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
When Aspect of Harmony ends, any remaining vitality is expelled as healing over 8 sec, split among nearby targets.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 142,597 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Chi Wave increases vitality stored by 25% for 5 sec.
Casting Vivify stores 87,056 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby ally. When you directly heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.

Heals the target for 1.5 million over 9.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 100,929, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 2 nearby allies for 132,108 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 8 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 79,327 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 165,959 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your dodge chance is increased by 5%.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 73,148 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 60% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 311,629.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 311,700.
Purify 5% of your Staggered damage each time you gain 3 sec of Shuffle duration.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 53,198 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
When you would be healed above maximum health, you instead convert an amount equal to 40% of your critical strike chance to a heal over time effect.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 39,023 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 31,982 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Gain up to 15% Mastery based on your current level of Stagger.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Stagger is 2% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 5% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 206,285 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 15,991 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 0.5 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.

Casting Purifying Brew grants a charge of Ox Stance, increased based on Stagger level. When you take damage that is greater than 60% of your current health, a charge is consumed to increase the amount you Stagger.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 69%. Additionally, Essence Font cooldown is reset instantly and heals up to 6 nearby allies for 38,459 health on channel start and end.
Flurry Strikes have 15% additional chance to critically strike.
Striking the same target 5 times within 2 sec grants 1% Haste, stacking up to 10 times.
Your attacks penetrate 12% armor.
Your Vivify always heals you for an additional 30% of its total value.

Damage dealt by Fists of Fury and Keg Smash counts as double towards Flurry Charge generation.

Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Keg Smash damage increased by 35%.
When you dodge or parry an attack, reduce all damage taken by 10% for the next 6 sec.
Flurry Strikes increase your Agility by 1% for 5 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Energy spenders deal an additional 20% damage.
Every 50 Energy spent reduces the cooldown of Storm, Earth, and Fire by 1 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 20% critical damage and increases the damage of your next set of Flurry Strikes by 10%.

Every 10 Flurry Strikes, become infused with the Wisdom of the Wall, gaining one of the following effects for 16 sec.

Critical strike damage increased by 30%.

Dodge and Critical Strike chance increased by 25% of your Versatility bonus.

Flurry Strikes deal 153,251 Shadow damage to all uncontrolled enemies within 6 yds.

Effect of your Mastery increased by 25%.
